6. ë¬¸ì„œ ê°ì²´ ì´ë™í•˜ê¸°

      <!-- index.html -->
  <body>
      <div class="first">

      // main.js
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      // element ë§Œë“¤ê¸°
      const header = document.createElement('h2');
      header.textContent = 'ì¶”ê°€ëœ h2 tagì…ë‹ˆë‹¤';

      const first = document.querySelector('.first');

          // element ë¶™ì´ê¸°

          first.appendChild(header);

      }

      }
      toFirst(); 
  });

  • 1ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ë‘ í™”ë©´ì´ ë²ˆê°ˆì•„ê°€ë©° ë‚˜íƒ€ë‚¨

  • ë˜ëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì€ ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰í•  ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆìŒ

    • arrayì— elementë¥¼ ë„£ìŒ

      <!-- index.html -->

      <div class="first">
          <h1>ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ div tag ë‚´ë¶€</h1>

      // main.js
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      // element ë§Œë“¤ê¸°

          document.querySelector('.first'), 
          document.querySelector('.second')

      let counter = 0;
      const move = () => {
          array[counter % 2].appendChild(header);
          counter ++;
      };

      setInterval(move, 1000);

  });

7. event ì—°ê²°

8. ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì œê±°

  • removeEventLister()
    • clickì—°ê²° ì‹œ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆë˜ eventListerë¥¼ ë³„ë„ì˜ ë³€ìˆ˜(ì—¬ê¸°ì„œëŠ” listener)ì— ë‹´ì•„ ì£¼ì–´ì•¼ í•¨
      <!-- index.html -->
  <body>
      <script src="main.js"></script>
  </body>

      // main.js
  let count = 0;

  const listener = () => {
      header.textContent = `í´ë¦­ íšŸìˆ˜ = ${++count}`;
  }

  // element ìƒì„±(h1)
  const header = document.createElement('h1');
  header.style.border = '1px solid black';
  header.style.userSelect = 'none'; // clickì‹œ textê°€ ì„ íƒë˜ì§€ ì•Šë„ë¡ ì„¤ì •
  header.textContent = 'í´ë¦­ íšŸìˆ˜ = 0';

  // element ìƒì„±(p)
  const p = document.createElement('p');
  p.textContent = 'ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœ: í•´ì œ';
  p.style.userSelect = 'none'; // clickì‹œ textê°€ ì„ íƒë˜ì§€ ì•Šë„ë¡ ì„¤ì •

  // element ìƒì„±(button)
  const connectButton = document.createElement('button');
  connectButton.textContent = 'ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²°';
  connectButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
      header.addEventListener('click', listener)
      p.textContent = 'ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœ: ì—°ê²°'; 
  });

  // element ìƒì„±(button)
  const disconnectButton = document.createElement('button');
  disconnectButton.textContent = 'ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì œê±°';
  disconnectButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
      header.removeEventListener('click', listener)
      p.textContent = 'ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœ: í•´ì œ';
  });

  // í™”ë©´ì— element ì¶”ê°€(ìˆœì„œëŒ€ë¡œ)
  document.body.appendChild(header);
  document.body.appendChild(connectButton);
  document.body.appendChild(disconnectButton);
  document.body.appendChild(p);

    ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ë²„íŠ¼ì„ í´ë¦­í•˜ë©´,

    1. ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœê°€ ON ë¡œ ë°”ë€Œë©´ì„œ
    2. header í´ë¦­ì‹œ í´ë¦­ íšŸìˆ˜ê°€ ì¦ê°€

    ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì œê±° ë²„íŠ¼ì„ í´ë¦­í•˜ë©´,

    1. ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœê°€ OFFë¡œ ë°”ë€Œë©´ì„œ

9. í‚¤ë³´ë“œ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸

  • eventê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆì„ ë•Œ, í•´ë‹¹ eventì™€ ê´€ë ¨ëœ ì •ë³´ê°€ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ê°ì²´ í˜•íƒœë¡œ callback fnì˜ ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ parameterë¡œ ê°€ì ¸ì˜´

    • ì¼ë°˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ parameterì˜ ì´ë¦„ì€ event ë˜ëŠ” e ë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•¨
      • e.code: ì…ë ¥í•œ í‚¤

      • e.currentTarget: eventë¥¼ ë°œìƒì‹œí‚¨ ê°ì²´

  • currentTarget, this ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ì½”ë“œ ìˆ™ì§€í•˜ê¸°

      <!-- index.html -->
  <body>
      <script src="main.js"></script>
  </body>

      // main.js
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      // element ìƒì„±(h1)
      const header = document.createElement('h1');
      header.textContent = 'ê¸€ì ìˆ˜ = 0';
      header.style.color = 'salmon';
      header.style.border = '1px solid salmon';
		
      // element ìƒì„±(textarea)
      const textarea = document.createElement('textarea');
      textarea.placeholder = 'ê¸€ìë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”';

      // í™”ë©´ì— element ì¶”ê°€

      // ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ ë°©ë²•
      textarea.addEventListener('keyup', (e) => {

      // ë‘ ë²ˆì§¸ ë°©ë²•

      textarea.addEventListener('keyup', (e) => {

      // ì„¸ ë²ˆì§¸ ë°©ë²•

    • ê¸€ì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ë©´ ê¸€ì ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì•Œë ¤ì¤Œ

10. ê¸°ë³¸ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ë§‰ê¸°

      function secretFactory() {
      const secret = "Favor composition over inheritance, `new` is considered harmful, and the end is near!"
      const spillTheBeans = () => console.log(secret)

      return {
          spillTheBeans
      }
  }

  const leaker = secretFactory()
  leaker.spillTheBeans()
    Console
    Favor composition over inheritance, new is considered harmful, and the end is near!
  • spillTheBeansë¥¼ objectë¡œ returní•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜(secretFactory)ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê²Œ ë˜ë©´, í•¨ìˆ˜ì˜ ë‚´ìš©ì— ì§ì ‘ì ì¸ ì ‘ê·¼ì„ ë§‰ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŒ

another example

function spyFactory(infiltrationTarget) {
    return {
        exfiltrate: infiltrationTarget.spillTheBeans
    }
}

const blackHat = spyFactory(leaker)

blackHat.exfiltrate() // Favor composition over inheritance, (...)

console.log(blackHat.infiltrationTarget) // undefined (looks like we got away with it)
Console
Favor composition over inheritance, new is considered harmful, and the end is near!
undefined

entry.content:
JavaScript ê´€ë ¨ í¬ìŠ¤íŒ…

Synchronous vs. Asynchronous

Synchronous(ë™ê¸°ì )

  • JavaScriptëŠ” synchronous(ë™ê¸°ì )
    • hoistingì´ ëœ ì´í›„ë¶€í„°, ì½”ë“œ ì‘ì„± ìˆœì„œì— ë§ì¶”ì–´ ë™ê¸°ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ë¨
    • hoistingì´ë€?
      var, function declararion ì€ ì„ ì–¸ ì§€ì ê³¼ ìƒê´€ ì—†ì´ JS engineì— ì˜í•´ ë¬¸ì„œì˜ ìµœìƒë‹¨ìœ¼ë¡œ ëŒì–´ì˜¬ë ¤ì§

  console.log('2');

Asynchronous (ë¹„ë™ê¸°ì )

  • ì–¸ì œ ì½”ë“œê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ë  ì§€ ì˜ˆì¸¡ ë¶ˆê°€
    e.g.) setTimeout(): ì§€ì •í•œ ì‹œê°„ì´ ì§€ë‚˜ë©´ ì „ë‹¬í•œ callback fnì„ í˜¸ì¶œí•¨ 
      function setTimeout(handler: TimerHandler, timeout?: number, ...arguments: any[]): number

      console.log('1');
  setTimeout(function() {
      console.log('2');
  }, 1000);
  console.log('3');

    ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì½ì–´ê°

    â†’ console.log(â€™1â€™); ì‹¤í–‰
    â†’ setTimeout() ì„ ë§Œë‚˜ 1000ms(=1sec) ë’¤ callback fn ì‹¤í–‰ ìš”ì²­
    â†’ console.log(â€™3â€™) ì‹¤í–‰
    â†’ 1ì´ˆ ë’¤ console.log(â€™2â€™) ì‹¤í–‰

(tip) ìœ„ì˜ callback fnëŠ” arrow fnìœ¼ë¡œ ë°”ê¿” ì“¸ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŒ

Callback fn

  • ë‚˜ì¤‘ì— ë‹¤ì‹œ(back) ë¶€ë¥´ëŠ”(call) í•¨ìˆ˜
  • synchronousì™€ asynchronous ë‘ ê°€ì§€ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•¨

Synchronous callback

function printImmediately(print) {
    print();
}
printImmediately(() => console.log('hello'));

Asynchronous callback

function printWithDelay(print, timeout) {
    setTimeout(print, timeout);
}
printWithDelay(()=> console.log('async callback'), 2000);

Result

console.log('1');
setTimeout(() => console.log('2'), 1000);
console.log('3');

// Synchronous callback
function printImmediately(print) {
    print();
}
printImmediately(() => console.log('hello'));

// Asynchronous callback
function printWithDelay(print, timeout) {
    setTimeout(print, timeout);
}
printWithDelay(()=> console.log('async callback'), 2000);

  • ì½”ë“œ ì‹¤í–‰ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì½”ë“œ ë‚˜ì—´ì„ ë‹¤ì‹œ í•´ë³´ë©´,

      function printImmediately(print) { // hoisting
      print();
  }

  function printWithDelay(print, timeout) { // hoisting
      setTimeout(print, timeout);
  }

  console.log('1'); // ë™ê¸°
  setTimeout(() => console.log('2'), 1000); // ë¹„ë™ê¸°
  console.log('3'); // ë™ê¸°
  printImmediately(() => console.log('hello')); // ë™ê¸°
  printWithDelay(()=> console.log('async callback'), 2000); // ë¹„ë™ê¸°

    function declarationì€ hoistë˜ë¯€ë¡œ ì½”ë“œ ìµœìƒë‹¨ìœ¼ë¡œ ëŒì–´ì˜¬ë ¤ì§
    function printImmediatelyì™€ function printWithDelayê°€ ìƒë‹¨ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ë™
    ì´í›„ ì½”ë“œë“¤ì„ ìˆœì„œëŒ€ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰í•¨
    â€˜1 â†’ 3 â†’ hello â†’ 2 â†’ async callbackâ€™ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ consoleì´ ì°í˜

Callback hell example

class UserStorage {
    loginUser(id, password, onSuccess, onError) {
        setTimeout(() => {
            if((id === 'minji' && password === 'pass') ||
            (id === 'someone' && password === 'pass too')
            ) {
                onSuccess(id);
            } else {
                onError(new Error('not found'));
            }
        }, 2000);
    }
    getRoles(user, onSuccess, onError) {
        setTimeout(() => {
            if(user === 'minji') {
                onSuccess({ name: 'minji', role: 'admin' });
            } else {
                onError(new Error('no access'));
            }
        }, 1000);
    }
}
  1. ì‚¬ìš©ìì—ê²Œ idì™€ passwordë¥¼ ì…ë ¥ ë°›ìŒ
  2. ì„œë²„ì— login
  3. loginì´ ì„±ê³µì ì´ë¼ë©´ í•´ë‹¹ idë¥¼ ë°›ì•„ì™€ role ìš”ì²­
  4. roleì„ ì„±ê³µì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°›ì•„ì˜¤ë©´ nameê³¼ roleì´ ìˆëŠ” ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ objectë¥¼ ì¶œë ¥
const userStorage = new UserStorage();
const id = prompt('enter your id');
const password = prompt('enter your password');
userStorage.loginUser(
    id, 
    password, 
    user => {
        userStorage.getRoles(
            user,
            userWithRole => {
                alert(`Hello ${userWithRole.name}, you have a ${userWithRole.role} role`);
            }, 
            error => {
                console.log(error);
            } 
            );
    }, 
    error => {console.log(error)});

ë¬¸ì œì

objectì˜ propertyì— ì ‘ê·¼í•˜ê¸°

2. Computed properties

      class Shape {
